thread.title: Youth football: Capezutto, McCann run wild for Little Warriors
thread.title_full: Youth football: Capezutto, McCann run wild for Little Warriors

author: Staff Reports sports@seacoastonline.com
title: Youth football: Capezutto, McCann run wild for Little Warriors
text: Posted Oct. 15, 2015 at 1:40 PM Updated at 4:21 PM Â» Social News The following are game summaries from last weekend's play in the Little Warriors youth football program. Information is provided by the coaches . Pee Wee A Chris Capezutto ran for 85 yards and two touchdowns as the Little Warriors beat Timberlane, 22-6 last Saturday and improved to 5-0 on the season. Tucker McCann rushed for 125 yards and a touchdown on 10 carries. Quarterback Kyle Tilley scored late in the fourth quarter on a 3-yard run up the middle, sealing the win. The offensive line led by Tyler Parkinson, Bodey Reed, Kolby Blaisdell, Jack McCann and Cam MacHardy. Defensively, Zach Fredericks and Owen Bateman each had a team-high four tackles, while Colin Harrington, Matt Alkire, Jack McCann and Dominic Gould all had three. Pee Wee B The Little Warriors and Timberlane played to a 0-0 tie last Saturday and are now 4-0-1 on the season. Kevin Tilley, Jake Fredericks and Frank Brown all ran the ball well for the Little Warriors. Defensive standouts included Tilley, Fredericks, Brown, Nolan Perkins, James Robillard, Jason Pinsonnault, Matthew Mattimore, and Quinn MacNeil.
